#include<iostream>
using namespace std;main(){int p,c,w,s,l,i,x,y,z;for(string t,B,S,L[500];cin>>p>>c>>w>>s,p;puts("?")){B=S="";for(l=x=y=z=i=0;i++<w;)B+=".";for(;y++<s;)S+=".";for(getline(cin,t);getline(cin,t),t!="?";){if(t=="")t=".";for(;t.size()%w!=0;)t+=".";for(i=0;i+w<=t.size();i+=w)L[l++]=t.substr(i,w);}for(;l%(p*c);)L[l++]=B;for(;p*c*z<l;){t="";for(y=0;y<c;t+=(y++?S:"")+(i<=l?L[i]:B))i=x+y*p+z*p*c;cout<<t<<"\n";if(++x>=p){x=0;z++;puts("#");}}}}

### main

loop do
  plen = gets.to_i
  break if plen == 0

  cnum = gets.to_i
  wdth = gets.to_i
  cspc = gets.to_i

  lines = []

  loop do
    line = gets.strip
    break if line == '?'

    while line.length > wdth
      lines << line[0, wdth]
      line[0, wdth] = ''
    end

    lines << line + '.' * (wdth - line.length)
  end
  #p lines

  cplen = plen * cnum
  rlen = lines.length % cplen
  if rlen > 0
    lines += ['.' * wdth] * (cplen - rlen)
  end
  #p lines.length

  while ! lines.empty?
    plines = plen.times.map{''}

    for col in (0...cnum)
      for i in (0...plen)
        plines[i] += '.' * cspc if col > 0
        plines[i] += lines.shift
      end
    end

    plines.each{|pl| puts pl}
    puts '#'
  end

  puts '?'
end

while True:
    plen=input()
    if plen==0:break
    cnum=input()
    width=input()
    cspace=input()
    L=[["."]*(cnum*width+(cnum-1)*cspace)for i in range(plen)]
    line=0
    pos=0
    extra=""
    while True:
        s=raw_input()
        if s=="?":
            for i in range(plen):
                print "".join(L[i])
            print "#\n?"
            break
        lens=len(s)
        if lens>width:
            extra=s[width:]
            s=s[:width]
        L[line%plen][pos:pos+lens]=list(s)
        line+=1
        if line>=plen:
            pos=(width+cspace)*(line/plen)
        while extra!="":
            if line>=plen*cnum:
                for i in range(plen):
                    print "".join(L[i])
                print "#"
                L=[["."]*(cnum*width+(cnum-1)*cspace)for i in range(plen)]
                pos=line=0
            lene=len(extra)
            if lene>width:
                temp=extra[width:]
                extra=extra[:width]
                L[line%plen][pos:pos+len(extra)]=list(extra)
                extra=temp
            else:
                L[line%plen][pos:pos+len(extra)]=list(extra)
                extra=""
            line+=1
            if line>=plen:
                pos=(width+cspace)*(line/plen)

while True:
    plen=input()
    if plen==0:break
    cnum=input()
    width=input()
    cspace=input()
    L=[["."]*(cnum*width+(cnum-1)*cspace)for i in range(plen)]
    line=0
    pos=0
    extra=""
    while True:
        s=raw_input()
        if s=="?":
            for i in range(plen):
                print "".join(L[i])
            print "#\n?"
            break
        lens=len(s)
        if lens>width:
            extra=s[width:]
            s=s[:width]
        L[line%plen][pos:pos+lens]=list(s)
        line+=1
        if line>=plen:
            pos=(width+cspace)*(line/plen)
        if line<plen*cnum and extra!="":
            L[line%plen][pos:pos+len(extra)]=list(extra)
            line+=1
            extra=""
        if line>=plen*cnum:
            for i in range(plen):
                print "".join(L[i])
            print "#"
            L=[["."]*(cnum*width+(cnum-1)*cspace)for i in range(plen)]
            pos=line=0
            if extra!="":
                L[line%plen][pos:pos+len(extra)]=list(extra)
                line+=1
                extra=""
